wikitext.*:
[[Mabel Suffield]]'s family lived in '''Evesham''', Worcestershire for generations, and [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s brother [[Hilary Tolkien|Hilary]]'s farm was located near Evesham.<ref>{{CG|C}}, pp. 984, 1017</ref> Tolkien said that Worcestershire was more like home to him than any other part of the world.<ref>{{L|44}}</ref>
